display_name: Calculated - Obstructive apnea (all desaturations) Hypopnea (3% desaturation) Index
description: Obstructive Apnea Hypopnea Index at 3% desaturation.  Ratio of the count of all obstructive apneas plus the count of hypopneas associated with at least a 3% oxygen desaturation to the total sleep time expressed in hours.
